text: Kim Tae-Young (born 8 November 1970) is a South Korean professional athlete. He is best known as an football player. He was a member of the Korean national team.National-Football-Teams.com, "Kim, Tae-Young"; retrieved 2012-9-5. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League League National cup National cup League cup League cup Continental Continental Total Total Club Season Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Kookmin Bank 1993 Semipro League ? ? ? ? ? ? — — ? ?
